column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Probably a great place
column2: but not great tonight. Monday of memorial day
column3: not that busy. Waited 12 minutes for drink order/etc (or anyone to come by the table). An hour into the experience
column4: was told the printer had run out of paper when the order was placed
column5: so another wait. Brief apology and a shrug.
